title: Norbert Florendo
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Norbert Florendo**

Norbert Florendo (b. 19--) is a [graphic designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Graphic%20Designer) and [typographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographer).

He served as Art Director, Ad Manager, Creative Director, Manager of Multimedia at Compugraphic and [Agfa](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfa), and [Typographer in Residence](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typographer%20in%20Residence) during the years between [Allan Haley](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Allan%20Haley) and [Cynthia Hollandsworth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cynthia%20Hollandsworth).

Contributed to the addition of over 400 new and licensed typefaces to the [Agfa-Compugraphic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfa-Compugraphic) library. Principally involved with the acquisition and marketing of [Otl Aicher's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Otl%20Aicher) [Rotis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rotis) Typeface System for Agfa.

Past Director-At-Large, [Type Directors Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Directors%20Club)  
Past TDC Traveling Exhibit Chairperson  
Former member of [ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATypI)

Graduate of [The Cooper Union](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cooper%20Union) and a calligraphy student of [Paul Standard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010180405/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Standard).
author: Norbert Florendo
